code: import React from'react';import'../styles/Sidebar.css';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faRocket,faPlus,faThLarge,faChartLine}from'@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Sidebar=_ref=>{let{onNewQuestion}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sidebar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"logo",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faRocket})," Provenance"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"new-question-btn",onClick:onNewQuestion,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faPlus})," New question",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"shortcut",children:"\u2318 K"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"sidebar-menu",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu-item active",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faThLarge})," My Space",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"badge",children:"1"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"menu-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{icon:faChartLine})," Activity"]})]})]});};export default Sidebar;
